content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft terracotta, I first need to craft clay. To do this I need to move one of the clay_ball into the crafting grid, so I will move the one in slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to move a second clay_ball into the crafting grid, so I will move the one in slot 36 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to move a third clay_ball into the crafting grid, so I will move the one in slot 36 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to move a fourth clay_ball into the crafting grid, so I will move the one in slot 36 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "clay", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the clay by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "clay", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 11, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_block", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "dark_prismarine", "quantity": 61, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the terracotta by smelting the clay in slot 11 to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1
